attributes.action: Tax foreign lorries on arrival at British ports.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At any one time there are thousands of foreign registered LGVs on UK roads.  These vehicles arrive with full fuel tanks and therefore do not pay UK duty on diesel but add considerably to congestion, pollution and road maintenance costs. £100 per visit would not be unreasonable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
